About the Company: Precision Pipes & Profiles Co Ltd (PPAP) is a leading manufacturer of high quality automotive sealing systems and exterior products in India.The product range of the company includes Automotive Sealing-Weather Strips,Trim Door Opening,Windshield Moulding,Roof Moulding,Quarter Window Seal,A- Pillar Garnish and C- Pillar Garnish.Exterior/ Interior Products-Skirt Air Damper,Body Side Moulding and Other Interior.
